citeinfo.title: Basin Identification: U.S. Geological Survey GAGES-II time series data update

descript.abstract: This dataset consists of a table with watershed identification information for the 9,067 conterminous United States sites of the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) Geospatial Attributes of Gages for Evaluating Streamflow II (GAGES-II) dataset. The data are a copy of basin identification fields already published in GAGES-II and provide no new information, but are provided here as a convenience.
descript.purpose: These data are intended as support for research efforts using the USGS GAGES-II sites.
descript.supplinf: This dataset is in support of study sites in the GAGES-II dataset (Falcone, 2011) and based on the watershed boundaries published there. References: Falcone, J.A., 2011, GAGES-II: Geospatial Attributes of Gages for Evaluating Streamflow, U.S. Geological Survey digital spatial data set, http://water.usgs.gov/GIS/metadata/usgswrd/XML/gagesII_Sept2011.xml. Lins, H.F., 2012, USGS Hydro-Climatic Data Network 2009 (HCDN-2009), U.S. Geological Survey Fact Sheet 2012-3047, https://pubs.usgs.gov/fs/2012/3047/.

idinfo.accconst: None. Please see 'Distribution Info' for details.
idinfo.native: Environment as of Metadata Creation: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.3.1 (Build 4959) Service Pack N/A (Build N/A)

attracc.attraccr: Values were spot checked against source data.

dataqual.logic: No formal logical accuracy tests were conducted.

horizpa.horizpar: A formal accuracy assessment of the horizontal positional information in the data set has not been conducted.

vertacc.vertaccr: A formal accuracy assessment of the vertical positional information in the data set has either not been conducted, or is not applicable.

citeinfo.title: GAGES-II: Geospatial Attributes of Gages for Evaluating Streamflow

srcinfo.srccontr: Sites for which these data provide updated data.

procstep.procdesc: Site information in this table is taken directly from the published GAGES-II dataset (Falcone, 2011) at https://water.usgs.gov/GIS/metadata/usgswrd/XML/gagesII_Sept2011.xml.

enttyp.enttypl: Attribute Table for basic basin identification information, BasinID.txt
enttyp.enttypd: Data consist of a comma-separated text file, which contains data for basin identification.

attr.attrdefs: Corresponds to unique station identifier in GAGES-II

attr.attrdef: Station name: a text description of the location of the site.
Gage latitude in decimal degrees, datum NAD83
Gage longitude in decimal degrees, datum NAD83
Flag if a Hydro-Climatic Data Network (HCDN) HCDN-2009 site (Lins, 2012)

attrdomv.udom: Yes (an HCDN-2009 site) or blank (not an HCDN-2009 site).
Ref (a reference site) or Non-ref (not a reference site)
Aggregated ecoregion designation as given in GAGES-II
